website_summaries.verdict: An easy do-it-yourself kit for good whitening results in the privacy and convenience of your home. Fast, safe, effective whitening without having to visit the dentist.
pros: Each syringe gives you enough gel for two treatments (upper and lower)
Wearing 10-15 minutes for 3 times a day will get great results without causing sensitivity
It will bleach the teeth after about three nights to the desired whiteness
cons: You have to be careful not to get too much product in the tray or it will irritate the gums
May cause some sensitivity at the gum line and the teeth

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste/excellent results!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the Starlite Smile mouth tray. Each syringe gives you enough gel for two treatments (upper and lower). I've used three syringes so far and usually do two treatments back-to-back, which may be a bit much. Doing two treatments back-to-back leaves my gums feeling somewhat raw and the taste is pretty bad. BUT ... this stuff works! After three syringes, I'm amazing at how white my teeth are (and I'm a 50 year-old who drinks coffee every day). My teeth are now sparkling white. I highly recommend these and plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Works and
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works and I keep them in the fridge. One tube gets your teeth so much whiter. I could only get 20% gel at the dentist and it was miserable keeping my trays on for 2-4 hours. Now it’s 15 minutes max. I started off with 5 minutes then worked my way up to 15 minutes. I just use a q tip to get any possible excess off my gums after I put my trays on and experience little to none sensitivity and my teeth are prone to sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Teeth became extremely sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I used this on and off for about 2 months. I have whitened my teeth before and have used prescription strength whitener from my dentist with zero problems. I had to stop using this product because my teeth because so extremely sensitive. I can’t even drink luke warm water. It’s been a few months since I stopped using this and my teeth’s sensitivity is just as bad as when I was using. Did it happen from this product, I can’t 100% say yes however I was not using anything else. The only thing I was using different was this product.
customer_reviews.author: Redbox73

customer_reviews.title: Burned my gums!
customer_reviews.text: Don't even consider this,if you value your healthy gums! I've ordered teeth whitening gel online before, and it has always worked out great. But after trying this product, I realized that what I ordered in the past was always no more than 30% peroxide. This packet contained syringes with 44% peroxide and that is way too strong for the average person. It actually burned my gums within a minute or two of applying it - I will be returning this product because it was dangerous and shouldn't be sold.
customer_reviews.author: nancy kelley

customer_reviews.title: Fake Image and Description
customer_reviews.text: I received my package today and I have to say that I am extremely disappointed. The product was nothing like the picture or description. It only came with three syringes when it was supposed to hold ten. I have not used the product yet, but I can honestly say that I am now a bit nervous to.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value-Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Only wish I could find a tray as good as what you get at the dentist. As a precaution, don't wear as long as recommended. This is so good...you don't to. Wearing 10-15 minutes 3x a day will get great results without causing sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: kelliekaz

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look good.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this stuff. Don't use too much in your trays. It will bleach your gums! They will heal but just a heads up. It doesn't look good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great product although tough to dispense and you have to be careful not to get too much product in the tray or it will irritate the gums. Also you must be careful not to exceed the recommended time or you will develop some sensitivity at the gum line and the teeth. It will bleach the teeth after about 3 nights to the desired whiteness.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Painful and poor whitening
customer_reviews.text: Ive used whitening products for over 15 years. I use to buy from my dentist but the last few times got online. This particular product is horrible. Hurt my gums from the second I placed the trays in. I would have probably dealt with it if the whitening was decent but it wasn’t. I had streaks and it did t look natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Whitens like its their life purpose
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be stronger then the originals teeth whitening kit I bought... but it really burns when you get it on your gun but other then that love the product
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Whitens and caused aching for me
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful! After about the 10-12th time using this, a good handful of my teeth started aching! I used the smallest amount - literally a small dab of a dot right on my retainers and the first 10 uses was no pain at all, and then the few times after that I started feeling immediate aching pain from my teeth. Aching pain lasted the whole day but eventually went away. Stopped using and will not buy again. - I did see whitening results while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go Slow With 44% Peroxide
customer_reviews.text: The bottom line. It worked far better at whitening this ex-smokers teeth than anything else. That's because it's 44% peroxide. It's powerful, but it can hurt the gums/teeth if you start out with too much for too long. I wouldn't go any longer than 10 minutes, maybe 5 to 7, the first time. Then skip a day and do the same. I won't go longer 15 minutes, so it took longer to get the end results. But there is no comparison between this and the 35% peroxide which didn't do anything for me after using it everyday for 30 minutes for 5 days. Just start slower and get your gums conditioned for the higher peroxide. It works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It works for real!
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! I suggest doing a 5 minute test and stick to a max of 10 minutes the first time to see how sensitive you are. My second time I did 20 minutes and will stick to that. I am super happy to get results like this with 1/4 a tube of product per session. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product, and similar - Carbamine Peroxide, 44% - for a number of years. I just used one of these recently and had people commenting on how white my teeth look. I drink coffee and drink red wine, (other than a full 48 hours after I clean), and always get good results. Taste is not awful, but nor is it good. Okay enough to keep molds in as long as required and then no after-taste.
customer_reviews.author: Know Good

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the worst purchase I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.text: After five minutes in I felt an intense burning where my teeth meet my gums, I check the mirror to see my gums inflamed and somewhat dyed white. I immediately spit out the trays and rinsed the gel out of my mouth and after about 15 minutes I have swollen red gums and very sensitive teeth. Just stick to natural methods, don’t use this poison on yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't live with out it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for around 5 years. Read directions!!! Don't leave on for more than 10 minutes or you will hurt your gums.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Christian

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want to gag, don’t buy this bleach!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this bleach taste horrible, but as time goes on while it’s on your trays (in your mouth) it liquifies and you’re forced to keep spitting until nothing is left. Therefore your teeth never get bleached! The bleach and taste is so strong that I gagged and nearly vomited. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t whiten my teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that a lot come out with one push. Too much gets on the trays. So you have to be careful when pushing the syringe. It did not work on my teeth. Now I’m stuck with all this product. I have used whiteners such opalescence and have gotten great results. Not the case with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: The product works Very effectively
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my third tube of this whitening gel which thus far has yielded 9 applications. (Three applications per tube) The results are substantial. I’d recommend this product to all. I let it soak into my teeth for 30 min. At a time.
customer_reviews.author: RYBOR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great after two uses I can tell a huge difference and I am a smoker so great for nicotine stains
customer_reviews.author: jennifer horton

customer_reviews.title: Best tooth whitening gel!! Finally something that works!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tooth whitening gel I have purchased and this is the fourth product I have tried. It really whitens teeth and as long as you follow directions it's a great product. Just keep it off your gums like it says. Very pleased and I will never buy a different whitening product for my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The Worst Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was professionally fitted with trays decades ago & have always purchased whitener from our dentist. Thinking it has become a bit too expensive, I decided to order online. What a mistake! Because of my experience & this product's potency, I staggered the usage: three times in one week. Being sure to fill the trays for tooth coverage without spill-over, there was no whitening effect whatsoever ... just bleeding gums. This is my first time to review an Amazon product. Others must know this is dangerous & should not be used under any circumstances!!!
customer_reviews.author: JELLISF

customer_reviews.title: Arrived near expiration date
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very good instruction sheet. Unfortunately they arrived near their expiration date. I am not seeing any results from this product, unlike other similar products. I am discarding a lot of plastic now. :(
customer_reviews.author: MarkB

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value and ridiculously effective. Have tried other methods for much more money, but this gave me much faster results. If you already have trays, this will give you near professionally whitened teeth.
customer_reviews.author: ThoughtfulReader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Tried it for the first time and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Tried it for the first time and had amazing results just after the first 30 min session. Seriously can’t wait to do it again tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a powerful product, that being said its ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a powerful product, that being said its is everything they said it would be and what i was expecting. Thank you. and YES i would order it again !
customer_reviews.author: thomas wainwright

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works. You can see the difference after ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works. You can see the difference after the first use. But it is something that needs to be an upkeep done every single day. It’s basically just whitening tooth paste. Without it daily you teeth will not stay as white.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Careful with how you apply it! It will burn your gums. It will also whiten your teeth very well. Might make your teeth sensitive Get the mineral gel. Revitalize
customer_reviews.author: jeremy briles

customer_reviews.title: Chemical burn to gums
customer_reviews.text: Chemical burn in under 2 minutes. I finally found that I can brush with it, but not use in trays. However, it doesn't lighten the teeth much that way. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: B. Alva

customer_reviews.title: Best Whitening I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a variety of Crest White, Crest 3D and Rembrandt strips and gels through the years. This one worked the best for me. The gel is strong and a couple of time I had to wipe it off and away from my gums due to irritation. So if you have sensitive gums, try a weaker solution or less to stay off the gums.
customer_reviews.author: Wm Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Great whitening gel!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent syringes, work perfectly for filling the trays. The gel is a strong mixture and works faster than any other I have tried. Very happy with this product and will absolutely be buying it again. And the number of syringes sent will be enough for several months!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It feels gritty and instead of staying in the tray it bubbles in my mouth for 20 minutes. So far not a very noticeable change in whitening my teeth
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lynn Bewley

customer_reviews.title: Price is fair, instructions poor.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are not clear product has no end caps to keep the profit from drying out between uses.
customer_reviews.author: chip

customer_reviews.title: Can use without the light. Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product without the light. On second use I noticed immediate results.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiany

customer_reviews.title: Not too strong
customer_reviews.text: They don’t whiten like other products but they work over time
customer_reviews.author: ***Lynette***

customer_reviews.title: Too much work!
customer_reviews.text: I like the strips better. They were a little irritating to my gums.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Yes it definitely works
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works but don’t over use it then ur teeth gets sensitive. I honestly use one tube for two usages .
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good whiting for the value. I smoke and it does wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Like all gels it tastes terrible. But you're not buying it for the taste. The product simply works! I have whitened my teeth in the past, Nothing works as good as this. I use for 10-15 minutes twice a day til I reach the level of whitening I want then just once a week to keep them there.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Ward

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product since I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since I bought it and have seen a BIG difference, contrary to the other products out there. I have every intention to re-purchase it when I run out. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works great!
customer_reviews.text: These work well!! Don’t get if you don’t have experience with whitening your teeth. Don’t leave on for long either, they are very strong! I can only leave on for 45 minutes till I start getting zingers. Also, it comes with a lot of bleach in it!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Painful experience: (
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this teeth whitener. It bubbled up on my gums and blistered them. Painful experience:(
customer_reviews.author: krystal klasen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They whiten quickly and if you use a light it even faster!
customer_reviews.author: Leejar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Taste real bad. Only used once but seem to whiten teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The taste is like every other whiting product, no good but bearable. The whiting is as expected and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Scand

customer_reviews.title: Works great, keep off your gums!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great value but don’t let the gel get on your gums or it can burn and they temp bleach for like half an hr on the gums. Awesome for teeth! I used to pay a lot to my orthodontist for a lesser percent for this same type. These are a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: they claim its 44%
customer_reviews.text: for some one who use 20% and dental grade this is more like 10% I did four, twenty minutes session in order to get the result of one twenty minutes session with the 20% grade.
customer_reviews.author: crosdale

customer_reviews.title: Use a led mouthpiece!
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a glo science kit with sub par results the refills were very expensive compared to these, needless to say using the mouth piece plus the whitening kit here l had awesome results. My only advice is use a tooth brush and apply 1/4 of the gel in the syringe, brush on, rinse and repeat in 5 minute intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzieq

customer_reviews.title: Too Strong
customer_reviews.text: They give you a good amount of gel with this, but it's way too strong for me. Maybe others will find it useful?
customer_reviews.author: laurence

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! Works amazing!! Just buy it!! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: deena haddad

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: I dont like it it make your mouth foam up and it make your teeth super sensitive I literally got tubes of thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: phenomenal

customer_reviews.title: did not work as well as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: Would have like the gel to work better. Best to use a fluoride paste on your gums before using the whitener, so that it doesn't burn your gums.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have my teeth whitened by a Dentist which was very costly. I use this product regularly and get the same effect at a fraction of the price

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work with our LED lamp but it was not delivering white enough results.
customer_reviews.author: Tbarr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Saves me a lot of time with the high percentage of Carbamide. The price can't be beat.

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! If you leave it on long enough to lighten a tiny bit, (hardly noticeable) you will burn your gums.

customer_reviews.title: Missing product
customer_reviews.text: I was shorted by a syringe. There were suppose to be 10 syringes there were only 9 and 1 didn’t have a full 3ml in it. This item is not available for return or exchange either.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: I used these the same day that I received them! These definitely whiten your teeth fast and I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family. Do not leave this on any longer than 10 minutes max!
customer_reviews.author: Brokenhalo

customer_reviews.title: Just get Crest strips
customer_reviews.text: This gel bubbles up so much I can’t keep it in my mouth without gagging. It may whiten good but I can’t use it long enough to find out.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I can only review about the shipment

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once with an LED whitening light, Immediately after removing the tray my gums were blistered and bleeding. Save your money!

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely painful!! I can’t use it for more than 10 mins. If you sensitive teeth this is not for you.

customer_reviews.text: This is strong peroxide. Ordered some from different place and it was like water.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that does what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: This product works very work well and will probably last longer than anticipated

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much better about myself and that is worth the small amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly and all was intact and wow...does it ever work. I feel so much better about myself and that is worth the small amount I paid.

customer_reviews.title: where are the trays as shown
customer_reviews.text: got this in the directions are showing to use trays and i dont see them with this gel

customer_reviews.title: Whitley recommend putting on for more than 30 minutes at a
customer_reviews.text: Really strong! Whitley recommend putting on for more than 30 minutes at a time
customer_reviews.author: Melissa White

customer_reviews.title: This gel was old, lumped together, must have ...
customer_reviews.text: This gel was old, lumped together, must have been sitting in your warehouse in the heat for too long.. Should have thrown it out, not sold it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not whiten at alll!!!!! Better off going to the dentist
customer_reviews.author: Manuela Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is thick and gritty. It’s hard to push out the syringe that it comes in. Will not be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Custom duty to be paid.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with product, worked well and syringes will last for ages. Wasn't however told that I would have to pay £11 for customs duty or would not have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mary Branley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: This actually works unlike some of the weaker ones from other sources...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Luckman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good whitening gel! Clearly see the changes in my teeth color within a few times of using it!
customer_reviews.author: Huyen Le

customer_reviews.title: Teeth Whitening
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery, great price compared to the dentist office for similar products. Would recommend only using for 2-3 hours at a time it is strong and will cause your teeth to be sensitive for 24hrs. This product will whiten your teeth noticeably with one application.
customer_reviews.author: r.cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner than expected, powerful​ enough for me. Saw result after third application!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but be careful about the gum line, it will kill the gum tissue and make it peel. I haven't quite figured out how to solve this problem yet other than being as careful as I can. I still use it because it does the job for whitening better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: ! It works !
customer_reviews.text: Work just like they're supposed to. I had noticeably whiter teeth after the first time. Good s***
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Teeth whitening gel was very effective and give goo d result
customer_reviews.author: Naghem Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to teeth whitening gel. I've been using another brand for years with my custom dentist-supplied trays, but thought I would give these a try. I've been using for several months with excellent results. I use a minimal amount to avoid overflowing onto my gums, and leave the trays in for 1-2 hours. I have experienced no irritation or sensitivity using this product. This product works and is an excellent value, and the individual syringes are larger than the brand name I was previously using. I will definitely be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: golfdog541

customer_reviews.title: works almost too well
customer_reviews.text: works well but hot damn! my teeth are sore for days. pros: does the trick cons: hot or cold pain... but only for a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: DougieDougDoug

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is way too strong. Warnings instructions suggest ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is way too strong. Warnings instructions suggest leave on for about 15 minutes to see if it irritates your gums. I left it on for approx 5 minutes and could no longer take the burning sensation. My gums actually turned white from the bleaching
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Sciarine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Noticeably whiter teeth after first use. I have not whitened my teeth in about 2 years. Usually with other gels I leave on for over an hr or even over night sometimes but with this gel I left it on for no longer than 30 mins and it makes such a difference. I wouldn't leave it on any longer than the recommended time. I will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: dakao

customer_reviews.title: Concentrated! Buyer be advised!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very strong. I have had to dilute it 50% to keep it in more than 5 minutes. It's economical, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Roughgarden

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking :(
customer_reviews.text: This gel is thick, gritty,difficult to apply and tastes horrible. I will have a tough time using it up. The gel I got directly from my dentist was so much better. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Whitens quickly but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. Definitely whitens quickly but be careful not to get it on your gums. I loved how quickly it whitened my teeth but when it got on my gums, it caused the skin to peel off after.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Otasua

customer_reviews.title: It works really good. Just dont over load the trays
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this I read the reviews about it and how it causes sensitivity. I learned that as long as you dont overflow the trays there is no pain. I wore it 4 hours today (1-3 and 7-9) with NO sensitivity at all. It works really good. Just dont over load the trays. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: Trying to fool you?
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the gel works fine, as it is just like all the other gels, but- how stupid do they think the consumers are?? The instructions were on a piece of a box, cut off of another completely different product, which included a special tooth paste, trays, and a whitening light. This package only contained the gel pens. Nice try-but no cigar!!
customer_reviews.author: DBH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I noticed a difference after using it once, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: The best for less in my view!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased overall! The product was true to form and I had read the previous reviews which were paramount to me ordering the product, in the first place! A great buy as I had paid a fortune to my dentist for less and the potency was much stronger. Very pleased with the results and was able to use my own molds. I will order again as the amount I got is good for months. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ong

customer_reviews.title: The syringe of gel has a nozzle end that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The syringe of gel has a nozzle end that is too large to control the amount of gel to fill a tooth space. It should be a narrow tip that fits into the tooth space and controls the amount more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: you have to be very careful not to put too much gel on as it can really be painful and does make your teeth very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This is very strong at 44%, you have to be very careful not to put too much gel on as it can really be painful and does make your teeth very sensitive. This is not something I have experienced before.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K E Janes

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this order. There is something wrong with the product due to the taste that seems abnormal compared to all other whitening gels I have tried. This product should be tested to determine what the taste is from.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I do think the product works amazing. I am a dental assistant and you do ...
customer_reviews.text: I do think the product works amazing. I am a dental assistant and you do get the most for your buck using this product. However I would have given 5 stars if I had received all my syringes, I only received 4 out of 10 and feel like I didn't get what I paid for. I did contact the seller and nothing yet?
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how well this product worked on it's first application. After using Crest whitestrips for two weeks and not seeing any noticeable improvement, I tried this. Wow! My teeth were visibly whiter after the first try. I have an invisalign retainer and this works perfectly with that. After reading the reviews I was careful not to use too much product and wiped my gums well after applying to remove excess residue. I did not notice any burning. I have not noticed any tooth sensitivity either, although I do use a toothpaste for sensitive teeth. I would highly recommend this product. It's a bargain and it really works!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I think it does a great job whitening
customer_reviews.text: I already had whitening trays, but I needed refill whitening gel. I think it does a great job whitening, but for me at least, it burns like fire ants. Vanity beats pain because I still use it! Price is good for so many syringes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lenckosz

customer_reviews.title: Whitens Teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple of years now. Since I'm not a dentist, it took some time to figure out the RIGHT AMOUNT + LENGTH OF TIME that was comfortable for me without burning my gums. I only put a little amount on both trays (less then half a syringe), then spread it around with a Qtip. I use it once a month to brighten my teeth. As a smoker, this helps whiten my teeth again. I also have sensitive teeth (hurts to eat ice cream, but I still do) & these don't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: LilyPut

product_meta.title: Teeth Whitening Gel Syringe Dispensers 44% Carbamide Peroxide Tooth Bleaching Gel Dispensers 10 pcs
product_meta.description: Includes 10 whitening gel 3ml syringe dispensers in maximum strength 44% Carbamide Peroxide. High viscosity gel formula provides maximum adhesion. This is crucial so that whitening gel remains suspended on tooth surfaces. Many thin and watery whitening gels “run off” teeth during the whitening process, which compromises a uniform and consistent bleaching of tooth stains and discolorations. Whitening gel quickly and safely removes stubborn stains due to coffee, tobacco, red wine, tea, foods, yellowing from age and more. Most people see noticeable whitening results after the first treatment. Experience a radiant smile without an expensive trip to the dentist. Your satisfaction is unconditionally guaranteed. CAUTIONARY: The 44% Carbamide Peroxide strength whitening gel is the highest strength peroxide based bleaching product available. It has the potential to irritate gums or cause moderate tooth sensitivity for some users, especially if too much gel is applied to dental trays. Use whitening syringe nozzle to apply small dots of gel along dental tray impression and then spread gel evenly across impression using syringe nozzle. The gel will expand when activated and any excessive application of gel will result in gel remaining suspended on gums, causing potential irritation. It is highly recommended that users perform short 10-15 minute whitening intervals to start in order to ascertain tolerance to the 44% whitening gel. The following is recommended to address gum or tooth sensitivity issues: Decrease the duration and/or frequency of treatments allowing gums to recover between treatments. If you are considering peroxide based teeth whitening for the first time, you might want to purchase a lesser strength whitening gel like 22%. We offer lesser Carbamide Peroxide concentrations through Amazon. Just click on the seller name Bleach Pro to view.
feature_bullets: Teeth Whitening Gel Syringes 44% Carbamide Peroxide strength. Maximum peroxide formula for fast whitening results. 10 syringes
High viscosity which is crucial for suspension of gel on tooth surfaces ensures consistent whitening results.
Quickly removes stubborn stains from tobacco, coffee, tea, red wines, yellowing from aging, foods and more!
Easy Do-It-Yourself procedure for excellent whitening results in the privacy and convenience of your home. Complete instructions included.
Fast, safe, effective whitening without an expensive trip to the dentist. 100% USA Made Gel and Dispensers. Guaranteed Results. * PLEASE SEE CAUTIONARY INFORMATION UNDER PRODUCT DESCRIPTION.
